name: waterborne2
description:
This game was created as a submission for the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam . This wasn't the original plan, though. The plan was to take my time and spend the whole of 2022 developing the game for a Halloween release. But unfortunately, after eight months, the only progress made was a very vague story outline and a folder full of background image reference scoured from the internet. Fortunately though, this meant the pre-preparation restrictions for the Spooktober hadn't been breached. When I realised this, motivation kicked in and I got to work.

The previous  game, Waterborne was entered in the 2021 jam and was shortlisted among 35 other entries with highly positive reviews from those that played it. Hopefully this sequel will be equally well received.

Comments and feedback regarding the game are welcomed. Feel free to link any lets plays or reviews etc. Very interested to see/hear/read reactions to the game. If you'd like updates to this game or other lazytiger projects, you can follow here or on twitter. 

FEATURES
  • Mysterious and thought provoking storyline
  • Unique watercolour/mixed media art style
  • Multiple puzzles to solve
  • 10k word count
  • Estimated 60 mins of playtime
CREDITS

Made by lazytiger using Ren'Py

Full credits can be found in game.
